snippet: Karen Strauss Cook was the first woman to work as a trader in Goldman Sachs’s equities division and then used her experience on Wall Street to co-found an executive search firm that helped women pursue a career while raising a family.
abstract: Karen Strauss Cook was the first woman to work as a trader in Goldman Sachs’s equities division and then used her experience on Wall Street to co-found an executive search firm that helped women pursue a career while raising a family.

headline.main: Karen Strauss Cook, Trader Who Helped Women on Wall Street, Dies at 61
